thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Shae McCallum
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Shae McCallum

author: Shae McCallum
title: Shae McCallum
text: I used the 21 day pass while I was solo travelling through Japan for a month, I was taking it day by day deciding where I wanted to go and didn't really have anything planned ahead and you can literally get anywhere in Japan with this rail pass and a PASMO card (metro card to use on the subways)! It was worth every cent! REALLY easy to use and activate in country, and is super popular for many tourists, would highly highly recommend to anyone going and travelling a fair amount throughout Japan.
